column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant | Participants # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#id=1
#text=I took a trip to the beach by plane .
#id=2
#text=I arrived at the airport early to go through the checkout process .
#id=3
#text=I decided not to check any bags , so I simply got my ticket and then went through the security line .
#id=4
#text=After security I went to my terminal to wait for the plane to board .
#id=5
#text=Once we went through the boarding procedure I sat at my seat next to the window .
#id=6
#text=Beside me was an older lady who made small talk with me until the plane took off -LRB- even talking through the safety speech given by the flight attendants before we took off -RRB- .
#id=7
#text=She quickly fell asleep once we were in the air though .
#id=8
#text=I observed the land below and the clouds for awhile before I too fell asleep .
#id=9
#text=I awoke to the sound of the flight attendant informing us the plane would soon be landing .
#text=I almost barfed as we made our decent , but managed to hold it in .
#text=Once we landed I departed the plane with the other passengers .
